fulltext:
Curriculum Vitae 
Truong Thi Thuy Trang 
Personal Details 
Full Name 
Truong Thi Thuy Trang 
DOB 
03 December 1989 
Gender  Female 
Relationship Status 
Single 
Nationality  Vietnamese 
Address 
101A Rach Bung Binh St., District 3, HCM City 
Phone Number 
0936 579 110 – (08) 39350 282 
Email 
helenacheung89@yahoo.com.vn / helena0312@gmail.com 
Skype  helena.truong0312 
Education Background 
- Open University Ho Chi Minh City 
Faculty: Business Administration  
Specialty: Marketing 
Time: 2007 – 2011. 
- Nguyen Du High School 
District 10, HCM City 
Time: 2004 – 2007. 
- Le Loi Junior High School 
District 3, HCM City 
Time: 2000 – 2004. 
- Foreign language skill: English (Good), Chinese (Basic). 
- Computer operation skill: Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) 
Vietnam National University HCMC – Certified in computer science level A. 
Graphic Design (Basic) 
Highlights 
- Having a dynamic personality, enjoying social activities and competitions, being creative in 
working. 
- Having an aptitude for listening, ability to impart feelings and thoughts for other people. 
- Well – communicated with others.  
- Having clear understanding about the Internet based on using social network (Facebook, Google 
Plus, Twitter, Linked In, Instagram, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube…) within four years.  
- Knowing thoroughly about demands of customer from 15 to 25 years old when using the Internet. 
- Being very interested in learning new experiences and finding out new things in life. 
Working Experience 
Specialty: Social Network/ Sales/ Media/ Customer service/ Internet 
Details: 
May 2017 – Oct 2018 
Marketing Executive at KKday Vietnam 
Responsibilities 
- Directly in charge of planning, running and monitoring the ongoing digital marketing activities on 
the virtual environment (Facebook, Instagram, Google, Youtube…) to increase sales and brand 
awareness  
- Be actively involved in SEO efforts (keyword, image optimization etc.)  
- Assist in the formulation of strategies to build a lasting digital connection with consumers  
- Prepare online newsletters, promotional emails and organize their distribution through various 
channels  
- Provide creative ideas for content marketing and update website  
- Measure performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools  
- Acquire insight in online marketing trends and keep strategies up-to-date  
- Maintain partnerships with media agencies, KOLs/Influencers, partners...  
- Other tasks as assigned 
Dec 2015 – Feb 2017 
Project Leader at Isentia Vietnam 
Responsibilities 
- Identify and analysis insights of brands/ social marketing campaign/customers on social platforms 
including SNS (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, etc), Forums and News sites. 
- Receive requirements for report from Account Department/Clients and manage to finish the tasks 
- Identify data, build up statistic, analysis and report insights of the brand/campaign/customer 
- Manage the team, introduce and establish best practice approach and share with the team 
- Organize and coordinate team members to ensure to meet deadline 
- Review tasks of data collecting and data analysis of team members 
- Report the insight of brand/customer by chart, analytic on power point 
- Join conference with clients, present/explain the report (in English or Vietnamese), and consult 
about Isentia’s services 
- Actively contribute to company advocacy 
- Do other jobs under assignment 
Projects 
- McDonald’s (Daily/Monthly/Quarterly Report) 
- Heineken (Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly/Campaign/Flash & Crisis Report) 
- Tiger (Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly/Campaign/Flash & Crisis Report) 
- Desperados (Monthly/Quarterly Report) 
- Strongbow (Monthly/Quarterly Report) 
- Grab (Monthly Report) 
- Uber (Daily/Monthly Report) 
- Auchan (Daily/Bi-weekly/Monthly/Quarterly Report) 
- Unilever (Category Report) 
- Generali (Bi-weekly/Monthly Report) 
- SC Vivo City (Campaign Report) 
- Techcombank (Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly/Flash & Crisis Report) 
- Giaohangnhanh (Flash & Crisis Report) 
- Tan Hiep Phat Beverage Group (THP Group): Zero Degrees Drink Tea, Dr Thanh Herbal Tea, 
Number 1 Energy Drink, Number 1 Active… (Daily/Bi-weekly/Monthly/Quarterly/Flash & Crisis 
Report) 
- Vietravel (Monthly/Yearly/Flash & Crisis Report) 
May 2014 – Dec 2015 
Sales & Marketing Admin at KPS System Corp 
Responsibilities 
- Receive and transfer a coming calls 
- Prepare the quotation, sales contract, annex and other documents for Sales & Business 
Development Department 
- Send, follow-up (working closely with customers, sales team and other departments), receive file 
documents in/out within Sales and Business Development Department carefully and in order 
- Update file included missing order and customer complaint 
- Update the data of customers and prices for the software 
- Contact with the customer and staff in the others department to fulfill the job 
- Do other tasks assigned by the Director and Business Development Department 
- Be responsible for the organizing the promotion activities, like exhibitions etc… 
- Be responsible for web and email promotion, search engine advertisement 
- Writing website content www.kps.com.vn 
- Manage Facebook Fanpage KPS System Corp 
May 2013 – May 2014 
Digital Specialist (Freelance) at NhimCafe & Wolf Media 
Responsibilities 
- Writing website content www.nhimcafe.com, fly ads content 
- Developing NhimIdol contest & NhimPerformance contest 
- Planning Internet Marketing program for NhimIdol contest with other members (Landing Page 
Content, Event FB, FB Ads, Content Seeding ...) 
- Manage Facebook Fanpage NhimCafe 
Feb 2012 – Sep 2013 
Sales Admin/Executive at Nuochoashop.com 
Responsibilities 
- Manage the customer records and databases 
- Answer telephone, in-person enquiries from clients or online supporting, ensuring high quality 
customer care 
- General administration duty 
- Report sale figures every week 
- Plan for any company’s events or programs 
- Manage other online channels via multi-social media account on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus... 
March 2011 – Sep 2011 
Account Executive at Digital Media Agency 
Knowledge about Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Pay Per 
Click, Online Display Advertising, Search Engine Optimization, Website… 
Responsibilities 
- Searching and accessing potential customers to make orders  
- Manage these regular customers  
- Developing ideas, business plans & following customers  
- Building customer database, updating and storing 
- Coordinating with Account Manager and Technical Staff to improve services  
- Monitoring market trends and information about competitors. 
Projects 
- RAFFLES Vietnam 
- DATVIET Security 
- NAM HAI Security 
- GALA ROYALE  
- THE’SPA… 
Sep 2009 – Dec 2009 
Collaborator at YANTV - The first world-class music entertainment channel in Vietnam 
Responsibilities 
- Joining trade market about YANTV & their services (promo reel kit, sales brochure, banners & 
backdrop, event) 
- Offering a suggestion, building program like: Searching VJ, PLAY ME. 
Key Abilities 
- Online Communication 
- Market Research 
- Strategic Planning 
- Creative Concept 
- Customer Service 
- Brainstorming 
- Sales & Sales Management 
- Marketing Plans 
- Research & Analytics  
- Internet Marketing 
- Social Network (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube,…) 
Personal Attributes 
- Communicator 
- Motivator 
- Creator 
- Competitor 
- Passionate 
- Developer 
- Humorous 
Interests 
- Travel 
- Fashion 
- Cosmetic & Beauty Product 
- Postcrossing 
- Bookcrossing

educations.major: Quản lý đô thị và công trình
educations.school: Open University Ho Chi Minh City
